data.title: NBA.com: NBA Communications
data.text:
Former champion Dwight Howard leads field in 2020 AT&T Slam Dunk

Former Slam Dunk champion Dwight Howard of the Los Angeles Lakers returns to the competition for the first time in 11 years as he headlines the field of four players who will take flight in the 2020 AT&T Slam Dunk on Saturday, Feb.

read more

NBA rules clarification from Celtics-Hawks game

The second technical foul called tonight on Atlanta’s Dwight Howard for hanging on the rim (4:03 remaining in third quarter at Boston) should have been deemed non-unsportsmanlike and should not have resulted in his ejection.

read more

Rockets’ Dwight Howard suspended one game; J.B. Bickerstaff fined

Houston Rockets center Dwight Howard has been suspended one game without pay for striking the arm of a game official and Rockets head coach J.B. Bickerstaff has been fined $10,000 for public criticism of the officiating.
